input.sentences: this animal bag would be cool for her daughter .
smiling for the camera with the relatives .
the brother is such a funny guy | the looks shows she misses him when he is away .
these two brothers are a riot together .
a cool brother and sister picture with crazy smiles .
output.sentences: For my mother's birthday, I set up a photo booth with strange props including this puppet.
She wasn't particularly interested in the props but appreciated being able to take pictures with her son and daughter.
She insisted that we take a nice picture of the two of us to hang in her office.
My husband and brother, however, were very interested in the photo booth props.
I also insisted that my husband and I take a nice picture together to hang in my office.
